Photos by Lennart Ootes!

Sevian, Samuel (2654) - Caruana, Fabiano (2800) 1-0
U.S. Championship (chess24.com) [6] 2021.10.12
C47 Four knights, Scotch, 4...exd4

1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Nc3 Nf6 4.d4 exd4 5.Nxd4 Bb4 6.Nxc6 bxc6 7.Bd3 O-O 8.O-O d6 9.Bg5 h6 10.Bh4 g5 11.Bg3 Qe7 12.Na4 Ba5 13.c3 Bb6 14.Nxb6 axb6 15.Qe2 Bg4 16.Qe3 Nh5 17.f4 d5 18.fxg5 Nxg3 19.Qxg3 Qxg5 20.h4 Qg7 21.Qxc7 d4 22.c4 Rfc8 23.Qd6 c5 24.Rf6 Bh3 25.Rf2 Kh8 26.Qxb6 Rg8 27.e5 Rae8 28.Re1 f5 29.Bf1 f4 30.Qxc5 f3 31.e6 fxg2 32.Bd3 Bxe6 33.Qe5 Qxe5 34.Rxe5 Bh3 35.Re4 Rxe4 36.Bxe4 d3 37.Bxd3 Re8 38.Be2 Kg7 39.a4 Re3 40.a5 Re5 41.b4 Re3 42.Rf3

The 2021 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

00:00 Hello Everyone!
